ArticleTitle.sentence: Constitutive activation of different Jak tyrosine kinases in human T cell leukemia virus type 1 (HTLV-1) tax protein or virus-transformed cells.

AbstractText.sentence: HTLV-1 infection causes an adult T cell leukemia in humans.

AbstractText.sentence: The viral encoded protein tax, is thought to play an important role in oncogenesis.

event.clue: The viral encoded protein tax, is thought to play an important role in oncogenesis.

AbstractText.sentence: Our previous data obtained from a tax transgenic mouse model revealed that tax transforms mouse fibroblasts but not thymocytes, despite comparable levels of tax expression in both tissues.

AbstractText.sentence: Constitutive tyrosine phosphorylation of a 130-kD protein(s) was observed in the tax transformed fibroblast B line and in HTLV-1 transformed human lymphoid lines, but not in thymocytes from Thy-tax transgenic mice.

AbstractText.sentence: Phosphotyrosine immunoprecipitation followed by Western blot analysis with a set of Jak kinase specific antibodies, identified p130 as Jak2 in the tax transformed mouse fibroblastic cell line and Jak3 in HTLV-1 transformed human T cell lines.
